review: Worked great until 2 weeks ago.  Now it suddenly will not stay connected to the WIFI.  No problems with anything else staying connected (phone, Ipad, laptop) - have a ROKU player that has no issues.  JUST the stick.  Totally disappointed in it.
author: hwa

review: We had an old Roku "hockey-puck" that was 720p. At the time we bought it, our internet was only providing us with 3mb per second streaming, and I was advised that a 1080p would pause and buffer frequently. Now that we have been upgraded to 16mb per second, we opted for this.  Set-up was fairly quick and easy. You still have to enter some info so the new unit can communicate with your modem/router, but in no time we were watching 1080p Netflix and Amazon Prime movies and shows. The price is right, and it has been working reliably for a quite a few months now.
author: smart consumer

review: LOVE this! it was so easy to set up! Very happy with the purchase.
author: Traci NAE

review: I bought it refurbished because I already owned another roku stick and had a great experience with it. However, I suppose that due to the fact that it's a refurbished unit, it didn't work properly consistently with some of the channels. I returned it for full refund and decided to get another product new, not refurbished. The $10 extra made it worth it...
author: Paola H.

review: We are very pleased with this product.  Have had it for a couple of weeks now and are enjoying how easy we can now access movies to watch on the TV.  Will recommend it to others.
